xml.data:
Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 2 Hetugocchaka, Kusalattika » 2.4 Hetusahetukaduka, Kusalattika » 2.4.1 Kusalapada » 2.4.1.7 Pañhāvāra » Paccayacatukka
Hetu
Hetugocchaka, Kusalattika
Hetusahetukaduka, Kusalattika
Kusalapada
Pañhāvāra
Paccayacatukka
Hetu
51.
1371Hetu ceva sahetuko ca kusalo dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
52.
1372Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe nava, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, āhāre tīṇi, indriye nava, jhāne tīṇi, magge sampayutte nava…pe…  avigate nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
<< Paccayacatukkaup Paccanīyuddhāra >>
